mobios.util
接口 DataLoader

public interface DataLoader

This is a general interface that can be used for loading data from files into programs. The data from the file is read sequentially and the resulting objects are packaged into a List, which is returned by the method.

版本：
2005.10.31
作者：
Neha Singh, Rui Mao, Willard

方法摘要
 Table loadData(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
           
 Table loadData(java.io.BufferedReader reader, int size)
           
 

方法详细信息

loadData

Table loadData(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
               throws java.io.IOException
返回：
a List of all data objects contained in the BufferedReader
抛出：
java.io.IOException

loadData

Table loadData(java.io.BufferedReader reader,
               int size)
               throws java.io.IOException
返回：
a List of first given number of data objects contained in the BufferedReader
抛出：
java.io.IOException
